title: The Intern, Volume 3
description: I should’ve known.I should’ve listened to my gut.But I didn’t.I listened with the wrong head.And where did it get me?Secrets.Lies.Deceit.She embodied them all. Deceived her way into my company.Lied about who she was.Kept secrets from me after convincing me I could trust her.Those walls she tore down are back up in full force.Cold. Angry. Unforgiving.She was no longer my intern. She was no longer mine.*The Intern is a three-part romantic suspense serial.*Not suitable for readers under 18.
author: Brooke Cumberland
